nodes.text: Secles Usopos was the male Sluissi councilor to the Twi'lek crime lord Abdi-Badawzi on Socorro.

He travelled to the Black Dust Tavern with two Gamorreans to invite Drake Paulsen and his father Kaine Paulsen to a meeting with Abdi-Badawzi. Drake refused, but was stunned and kidnapped by Abdi-Badawzi as the smuggler left the tavern. He took him to the crime lord's base. At Abdi-Badawzi's inner chamber, Uslopos directed the gathered crowd to be silent so the gangster could address Drake and force him into making a smuggling run.
